section.title: XSynchronize
section.para: The XSynchronize command controls whether X requests are sent to the X server immediately or not. Normally, requests are sent in larger batches to save unnecessary communication. To send requests immediately, use "True" as the argument, to disable this use "False" or to toggle between both methods use "Toggle" or omit the bool argument. Fvwm defaults to synchronized requests when started with the --debug option. This command is intended for debugging only.
